definitions.text: cause to be embarrassed; cause to feel self-conscious
hinder or prevent the progress or accomplishment of
examples: His brother blocked him at every turn

definitions.text: feeling or caused to feel uneasy and self-conscious
examples: felt abashed at the extravagant praise
chagrined at the poor sales of his book
was embarrassed by her child's tantrums

definitions.text: made to feel uncomfortable because of shame or wounded pride
examples: too embarrassed to say hello to his drunken father on the street
humiliated that his wife had to go out to work
felt mortified by the comparison with her sister
